com.gurunars.item_list

Interface ItemViewBinder<ItemType extends Item>

  • Type Parameters:
    ItemType - subclass of the Item instances of which are used to populate the views
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SelectableItemViewBinder<ItemType>

    public interface ItemViewBinder<ItemType extends Item>
    Glue between the Item of a specific type and its view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind(android.view.View itemView, ItemType item, ItemType previousItem)
      Populate the view based on data from the item.
      android.view.View getView(android.content.Context context)
      Return a view instance to be populated

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        android.view.View getView(android.content.Context context)
        Return a view instance to be populated
        Parameters:
        context - to be used for rendering
        Returns:
        rendered view

      • bind

        void bind(android.view.View itemView,
          ItemType item,
          @Nullable
          ItemType previousItem)
        Populate the view based on data from the item. Use previous item to make a decision about which animation to use by diffing it with the current item.
        Parameters:
        itemView - view to be populated - the one returned by getView
        item - payload to be used for populating the view
        previousItem - previous version of the item. Can be null.
